entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenAPI XML source generator "slow" #61146
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm #61144
  • Quarantine NavigationManagerUriGetsUpdatedOnEnhancedNavigation_BothServerAndWebAssembly( #61143
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #61142
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #61141
  • Packaging of static assets of razor libraries is different in Githhub Actions from Local Computer #61140
  • Incorrect OpenAPI Schema Generation for Recursive Types #61139
  • API proposal for Declarative Model for Persistent Component and Services State #61138
  • Api proposal for NavLink.ShouldMatch #61137
  • API proposal for CloseColumnOptionsAsync #61135
  • API proposal for NotFound #61133
  • HybridCache: Disabled Local Cache returns InvalidData warning #61132
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #61130
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #61129

Closed

  • Perf improvement: httpsys-encoded-url #61128
  • API proposal for RowClass #61136
  • Login/Out problem with Entra External ID (example BlazorWebAppEntra-.net9). Login succesful, logout with problem #60941
  • [Blazor] Can't register custom AuthenticationStateProvider when already using EntraID auth. #60848
  • Microsoft.OpenAPI 2.0.0.0 has breaking changes #61123
  • [OpenAPI] error CS0122: 'Type' is inaccessible due to its protection level #61037
    10.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Harden handling for generic type arguments in source generator #61145
    area-mvc
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25174.4 #61134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Updated to vs 17.13 to align with xcopy-msbuild #60763
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • Transitive package to provide coherency in dotnet/extensions #61007
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Add CurrentLtsTargetFramework only when it's not present #61076
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.6.1 to 4.6.2 #61068
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2b6b042` to `c2ceb2b` #61071
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Update accessibility check for types in same assembly #61082
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Remove unneeded 'fixed' statements from SocketAddress #61006
    area-networking, reduce-unsafe
  • Fix up handling for non-generic Task and ValueTask #61085
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/setup-node from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 #61067
    area-infrastructure
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • [main] (deps): Update dotnet/arcade requirement to 235443a5c1136571cacdfd40576f263f26bf5b9b #61066
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Remove explicit WasmBootConfigFileName from tests #61034
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
